channel.title: Why google ads put rune locus on Moparscape?
channel.description:
Hum, I was thinking why I see rune locus Adds on Moparscape ?
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/258mmv6.jpg[/img]

item.title: Why google ads put rune locus on Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:26, topic:371668”][quote author=xx matty xx link=topic=467738.msg3420990#msg3420990 date=1291512670]

why did you block your moparscape username?

Read around on the picture, its the same account, he failed to block out some of it.
Moparscape.org > Profile of wanttobecoders > Forum Profile

He could be viewing his main profile on a secondary. Possible.
[/quote]No, it’s his account.

General Statistics - wanttobecoders
Total Time Spent Online: 1 days, 16 hours and 55 minutes.

Time in screenshot: 1 days, 15 hours and 32 minutes

I am hoping that is sarcasm…[/quote]
Why would it be sarcasm…?

Read full topic
item.source: Why google ads put rune locus on Moparscape?

item.title: Why google ads put rune locus on Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

google adsense uses keywords from your website and advertises with other websites with somewhat the same matching keywords.

i would know because i’ve used it. I don’t think it really is mitb’s choice to have a runelocus advertisement on his page. unless he’d rather go without the money and other benefits.

Read full topic
item.source: Why google ads put rune locus on Moparscape?

item.title: Why google ads put rune locus on Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:22, topic:371668”]Oh, so he gets adverts based on the content of the site in a way?

I always imagened you’d get to pick a catergory.[/quote]

From what I remember being said in the last thread about this, Google Adsense picks up keywords from the site and finds similar words on another site and advertises them.

Read full topic

item.title: Why google ads put rune locus on Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“Primadude, post:21, topic:371668”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=467738.msg3420589#msg3420589 date=1291483694]

Topic has been posted like 4 times, I don’t believe Moparisthebest can do anything about it. Though, does it really matter?

He is the one who put the Ads there in the first place.

Thats how he makes money to keep the site running.

But does he get a choice on specificly what ads go on there? Or a general catergory of ads which will appear on the site?

I don’t think he’d tick the ‘google ad’ box if he had such a choice.

@Exion: Shhh, they might change it xD
[/quote]

The ads are run by google, at http://google.com/adsense, though the ads that are displayed are a category based on what content this site has. For example, most of the time there are either game or webhosting ads displayed; that content is on this site frequently.[/quote]

Oh, so he gets adverts based on the content of the site in a way?

I always imagened you’d get to pick a catergory.

Read full topic
item.source: Why google ads put rune locus on Moparscape?

item.title: Why google ads put rune locus on Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:20, topic:371668”][quote author=ry60003333 link=topic=467738.msg3420578#msg3420578 date=1291483401]

Topic has been posted like 4 times, I don’t believe Moparisthebest can do anything about it. Though, does it really matter?

He is the one who put the Ads there in the first place.

Thats how he makes money to keep the site running.
[/quote]

But does he get a choice on specificly what ads go on there? Or a general catergory of ads which will appear on the site?

I don’t think he’d tick the ‘google ad’ box if he had such a choice.

@Exion: Shhh, they might change it xD[/quote]

The ads are run by google, at http://google.com/adsense, though the ads that are displayed are a category based on what content this site has. For example, most of the time there are either game or webhosting ads displayed; that content is on this site frequently.

Read full topic

item.title: Why google ads put rune locus on Moparscape?
item.dc:creator: @John459 John459
item.description:
@John459 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:5, topic:371668”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=467738.msg3419860#msg3419860 date=1291429840]

why did you block your moparscape username?

hes got 2 accounts maybe?
[/quote]You can have more then 1 account, so whats the big deal lol.[/quote]

Rule 4:
We only have one forum account per person, you can use the same account for Moparscape and Moparisthebest.

Anyways, it’s called adsense and money is made every time an ad is clicked.
